title: Garmin vívomove HR: Fashionably Fit Is Just a Tap Away
description:
The stylish vívomove HR hybrid smartwatch features a touchscreen with a discreet display. Precision hands show the time and dynamically move away when you swipe through your messages, heart rate¹ and more. It counts your steps and calories while monitoring wellness, including all-day stress tracking1. 

Monitors heart rate at the wrist1 24/7 with Elevate™ wrist heart rate technology 
All-day stress monitoring shows you stress levels and moments of rest throughout the day
Fitness monitoring tools, such as VO2 max and fitness age, give you better insight into your current fitness levels 
Displays steps, calories, distance, heart rate and intensity minutes1
Battery life2: up to 5 days
Stay connected with smart features3 such as auto uploads, smart notifications, music controls and more
2Battery life may vary depending on usage
